text: Ferdinando "Nando" Gazzolo (16 October 1928 - 16 November 2015) was an Italian actor and voice actor. He was born in Savona, Italy. Gazzolo was known for his roles in West and Soda (1965), He Who Shoots First (1966) and La ragione degli altri (1965). Gazzolo died in Nepi, Italy from complications of pneumonia at the age of 87. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1928 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian voice actors Category:People from Savona
title: Nando Gazzolo
